All my 2024 writing in one place.

Writing is the single best tool to beat your bias

The respect you earn within crypto is incredibly fragile.

Do you ever think about how you earn it or more importantly, where you spend it?

Within crypto, one's respect increases from a good signal but is spent with a bad one. A few bad calls and you are very quickly back to‚Ä¶

be particularly careful of PNL larps over the next few months

The truth is that most people who are genuinely successful do not want to share their PNLs because it‚Äôs not good for security 

so 90% of the time people share big PNLs it‚Äôs fake larp for engagement farming

The blockchain is a public ledger, which means it almost never makes sense to attach your identity to your main wallet(s).

If you plan on doing so, you need to understand that every subsequent wallet you attach to them is now public forever, past and future actions.

I'm seeing so many bet on a black swan event, some serious bear market PTSD.

People forget that although the world can be irrationally bad, it can also be irrationally good.

If you're considering an investment involving crypto assets, be cautious. 

Crypto asset securities may be marketed as new opportunities but there are serious risks involved.

Founders who still believe this phrase are delusional and shouldn't be trusted.

In almost everything in life, great things don't happen purely because X is good, or Y is talented.

The planned or organic marketing is what takes a project next level, regardless of utility.

Starting in 2002 when I left school to play poker for a living I have been around people who are always looking for quick and easy ways to get rich. 

The premise that most ppl can trade small amounts of capital and get wealthy is flat out wrong and to be quite frank, a path to a‚Ä¶

But something no one talks about as a huge driver for $GRAIL is their launch on L3 @XAI_GAMES
